title: Recipe Finder
caption: Recipe Search App
brief: To create an app that provides recipes corresponding to any searched ingredient.
highlight: The app includes a user input search field that makes requests to the Edamam food API.

title: Short Games
caption: Desktop & Mobile Games
brief: To create a collection of games that can be completed quickly. There are currently 2 games in the collection, Alien Zap and Owl Attack.
highlight: Alien Zap includes a small particle effect and collision detection, both games include a score board and Owl Attack can be played on both desktop and touch devices.

title: Search Your Book
caption: Book Analysis App
brief: To create an app that can search any text file and provide information on the frequency and location of any word used in the text.
highlight: The app includes a word search field with text highlighting, 'previous' and 'next' buttons to step through highlighted words, a file input field for loading .txt files, word count and popular words tally.

title: Cat Clicker
caption: Drag Drop & Vote App
brief: To create an app using scalable JavaScript. It can hold an unlimited amount of cat photos that can be clicked to increase their vote count and rearranged on the page.
highlight: The app makes use of a prototype design pattern and includes a drag and drop function.

title: Secret Cipher
caption: Decode & Encode Messages App
brief: To create a scalable app based on the ROT13 cipher method. It can decode a message based on letter rotation as well as encode one.
highlight: The app has numerous options for letter rotation amount and includes a copy to clipboard function for the resulting message.
